description:
For a timeless and stylish look with high-performance features, look no further than the Ryders Eyewear Spitfire Sunglasses. Inspired by the popular Coco frame, they offer a blend of vintage charm and modern functionality.

  • With an expanded curved lens made of impact-resistant and scratch-resistant polycarbonate, these shades provide enhanced vision and protection from UV rays and glare
  • The lens also has an anti-fog coating that prevents condensation and a hydrophobic coating that repels water, oil, and dirt
  • The sleek metal frame is both lightweight and durable, and adjustable nose pads ensure a comfortable, customized fit
  • These sunglasses suit medium-large faces
name: Ryders Eyewear Spitfire Sunglasses - Unisex
